google_translated: This is a murder by the dead

en_text: Maxim was chosen by Milly to accompany her to the other side.
jp_text:
マクシムは ミリィによって
死への道連れに選ばれたのだよ
google_translated:
Maxim is by milli
He was chosen as the way to death

en_text: After all, it's a knight's duty to escort and protect ladies.
jp_text:
騎士とは 貴婦人に付き従い
守るものだからね
google_translated:
Knights with a lady
Because it is something to protect

en_text: Are you talking about that outfit?
jp_text: それで あの衣装を？

en_text: A stolen key...
jp_text: 盗まれた鍵

en_text: The fragments of the chaos have all been gathered.
jp_text: 混沌(カオス)の欠片は 全てそろった

en_text: I will now reconstruct the events.
jp_text: これから 再構成をしてやろう

en_text: Milly Marle slipped Maxim a sleeping pill to make him fall asleep and dressed him like a knight.
jp_text: 騎士の衣装に着替えさせた

en_text: She then entered the charnel house using the stolen key...
jp_text:
その後 盗んだ鍵を使い
納骨堂に入り―
google_translated:
Then use the key to steal
Entering Ossuary-

en_text: ...and replaced one of the old corpses with Maxim.
jp_text:
寝台の上の古い遺体と
マクシムを入れ替えたのだよ
google_translated:
With older bodies above the sleeper
I replaced Maxim

en_text: She placed him in the back where there isn't much light so that the undertakers wouldn't notice.
jp_text:
薄暗い納骨堂の奥だ
葬儀屋も気づくまい
google_translated:
It is the back of a dim
Funeral shop also aware

en_text: And then she died.
jp_text: そして 彼女は死んだ

en_text: But why would she...
jp_text:
（足音）
でも なんで そんなことを…
google_translated: But why is such a thing ...

en_text: Inspector! Don't forget to thank Victorica!
jp_text:
ヴィクトリカに
お礼 言ってくださいよ！
google_translated:
To Viktora
Thank you very much!

en_text: I simply came here to talk to one of the eyewitnesses.
jp_text:
私はただ 目撃者の君に
話を聞きに来ただけだよ
google_translated:
I'm just a witness
I just came to hear the story

en_text: Regarding the motive...
jp_text: なっ…

en_text: Look into the relationship between the culprit and the victim.
jp_text:
犯行の動機だが
２人の関係を調べてみることだ
google_translated:
It is a motivation of the crime
It is to examine the relationship between two people

en_text: In the language of flowers, primroses are another way of saying...
jp_text: 桜草の花言葉は…

en_text: Someone! Open the door!
jp_text: 誰か 開けてくれーっ！

en_text: A woman's feelings are deep and strong.
jp_text:
女の思いとは かくも深く
強いものなのだよ
google_translated:
Woman's thoughts are deeply deep
It is strong

en_text: That's...
jp_text: （一弥）灰色狼… それって

en_text: What? You intend to linger?
jp_text: 何だ？　まだ いるつもりか？

en_text: Of course! You still haven't told me about Avril's book.
jp_text:
アブリルの本のことが
まだ 残ってるじゃないか
google_translated:
Abril's book
Isn't it still remaining

en_text: I'm getting bored.
jp_text:
（ヴィクトリカ）
面倒くさくなってきた

en_text: Boredom is my greatest enemy. The second greatest being chatter.
jp_text: ２番目の敵は けん騒だ

en_text: Avril came into the library.
jp_text: （一弥）アブリルが図書館に来てた

en_text: She was acting really strangely.
jp_text: やっぱり 様子が変だった
google_translated: After all how it was strange

en_text: But I want to believe her.
jp_text: でも 信じたい

en_text: Victorica! Where are you going?
jp_text:
（一弥）なっ…
ヴィクトリカ どこ行くの？

en_text: Book! Book! Book!
jp_text: （ヴィクトリカ）本 本 本！

en_text: It would be terrible if you slipped and fell.
jp_text: 足を滑らせたら 大変だから
google_translated: Because it is difficult if you smooth your feet

en_text: Victorica!
jp_text: ヴィクトリカ！　あっ…

en_text: The Golden Fairy and the Grey Wolf.
jp_text: （一弥）“金色の妖精”

en_text: Victorica, just who are you?
jp_text: ヴィクトリカ 君って…

en_text: The fragments of chaos whistle to me.
jp_text:
（ヴィクトリカ）
混沌(カオス)の欠片が ささやいている
google_translated: Fragments of chaos  are doing him

僕も 何となく そんな気がしてた
